  responses={{"200":{"description":"Delay Info","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["next","delay"],"properties":{"next":{"type":"object","required":["absolute","relative"],"description":"Information about when the next request can be made. Use this to determine when to make the next request.","properties":{"absolute":{"type":"number","format":"timestamp","description":"Absolute timestamp (in milliseconds) after which the next request can be made","example":1726829503123},"relative":{"type":"number","description":"Relative delay (in milliseconds) after which the next request can be made","example":800}},"title":"NextRequest"},"delay":{"type":"object","required":["millis"],"description":"Information about the delay between requests. These numbers will remain the same for all requests with the same API key. You can use this to send requests on a schedule, for example.","properties":{"millis":{"type":"number","description":"Delay between requests (in milliseconds) - depends on the API key used for this request","example":1200},"seconds":{"type":"number","description":"Delay between requests (in seconds) - depends on the API key used for this request","example":1.2}},"title":"DelayInfo"},"limit":{"type":"object","required":["limit","remaining"],"description":"Information about the rate limit for the current request.","properties":{"limit":{"type":"number","description":"Limit of requests in the current window (usually 1 minute). Same as the 'X-RateLimit-Limit' header","example":60},"remaining":{"type":"number","description":"Remaining requests in the current window. Same as the 'X-RateLimit-Remaining' header","example":58},"reset":{"type":"number","description":"UNIX epoch timestamp (seconds) when the rate limit will reset. Same as the 'X-RateLimit-Reset' header","example":1746869295}},"title":"LimitInfo"}},"title":"RateLimitInfo"}}}}}}
>
